attributes.action: STOP, TORTURE & MURDER BY ITS COURTS & GOVERNMENT AGENTS.  ABUSES OF POSITION & POWER.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop UK CLOSED SECRET Courts torturing and murdering.  Stop UK Courts corrupting everything and everyone around them.  Stop abuses of the Mental Health Act and false imprisonment to cover up what they the Courts are illegally doing to innocent, defenceless members of the British public.  To stop horror by those in authority against the weak and the feeble.  Stop Courts, Police, Hospitals, Barnet Council, etc. etc. all torturing and murdering the public.  The UK Government is to blame for allowing this horror to continue.  CLOSED SECRET FAMILY COURTS = PAEDOPHILIA IN HIGH RANKING POSITIONS.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
